Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific Oxoid Meropenem/Vaborbactam Disc (30 μg) MEV30
Submitter Information: Oxoid Limited (Part of Thermo Fisher Scientific)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific Oxoid Meropenem/Vaborbactam Disc (30 μg) MEV30 for antimicrobial susceptibility testing using disc diffusion.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine susceptibility to Meropenem/Vaborbactam in Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, and Enterobacter cloacae species complex using the semi quantitative agar diffusion method.
